sentences.en: But what the alcohol myopia model does provide is a very intuitive and easily understood way of thinking about how alcohol affects us, for better and worse.

sentences.en: Serious eye strain can lead to persistent headaches, muscle pain in the head, neck and upper back, as well as long term problems like myopia.
sentences.cn: 严重的眼疲劳会导致长期的头痛，头部，颈部和上发背的肌肉疼痛，也可能会引起一个长期的问题近视。

sentences.en: Studies show that children who play sport are less susceptible to myopia.

sentences.en: With the ripeness of myopia therapy, the hyperopia therapy becomes the focus.

words.tran_cn: [眼科]近视；目光短浅，缺乏远见
